price: Mu by’ukuri ku manywa uba uhugiye muri byinshi.
arabic: إِنَّ لَكَ فِي ٱلنَّهَارِ سَبۡحٗا طَوِيلٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: inna laka fī al-nahāri sabḥan ṭawīlan
